title: What Kenji López-Alt Cooks His Family for Dinner
description: If you can boil water, slice an onion and use a strainer, you can make niku udon, a Japanese beef noodle soup that is the cookbook author’s go-to weeknight dinner.
dc:creator: J. Kenji López-Alt
media:credit: Lennart Weibull for The New York Times. Food Stylist: Victoria Granof.
media:description: Simple, satisfying and easy to cook, niku udon pairs sweet-savory beef with thick, chewy udon.
